title: Whittaker vs Adesanya: Undercard results, UK start time, TV channel and live stream
text:
Robert Whittaker defends his middleweight title against Israel Adesanya at UFC 243 tonight.

The 185lb champion fights for the first time in 18 months having battled a string of injuries since his win over Yoel Romero in their rematch.

But he takes on rising star Adesanya who has shot to prominence in recent months with a string of victories, culminating in a win over Kelvin Gastelum.

That crowned him the interim champion in Whittaker's absence and tonight he bids to convert it into the real thing.

The fight will be streamed live on BT Sport but you can follow all the action right here with the main event due to start at 5am.
description: Robert Whittaker defends his middleweight title against Israel Adesanya at UFC 243 in Melbourne tonight
